com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.domains

Class Domain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.domains.Domain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscreteDomain, IntDomain, ObjectDomain, RealDomain, RealJointDomain

    public abstract class Domain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Base class for variable domains, which specify a set of valid values for a variable type.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • asDiscrete

        @Nullable
public DiscreteDomain asDiscrete()
        If domain isDiscrete() returns object cast to DiscreteDomain, otherwise returns null.

      • asReal

        @Nullable
public RealDomain asReal()
        If domain isReal() returns object cast to RealDomain, otherwise returns null.

      • asRealJoint

        @Nullable
public RealJointDomain asRealJoint()
        If domain isRealJoint() returns object cast to RealJointDomain, otherwise returns null.

      • asComplex

        @Nullable
public ComplexDomain asComplex()
        If domain isComplex() returns object cast to ComplexDomain, otherwise returns null.

      • getDimensions

        public int getDimensions()
        The number of dimensions for elements of the domain.

        Returns one for scalar domains. For RealJointDomain and JointDiscreteDomain, returns the size of the array needed to hold the components of a single element.

        Since:
        0.07

      • hasIntCompatibleValues

        public boolean hasIntCompatibleValues()
        True if domain only contains values that can be represented using an int.

      • isBounded

        public boolean isBounded()
        True if the elements of the domain are bounded to some subset.

        The default implementation returns true if not isDiscrete().

        Since:
        0.06

      • isDiscrete

        public boolean isDiscrete()
        True if domain is an instance of Discrete.
        See Also:
        asDiscrete()

      • isIntegral

        public boolean isIntegral()
        True if values of domain are (32-bit) integers.

        Since:
        0.05

      • isReal

        public boolean isReal()
        True if domain is an instance of RealDomain.
        See Also:
        asReal()

      • isRealJoint

        public boolean isRealJoint()
        True if domain is an instance of RealJoint
        See Also:
        asRealJoint()

      • isComplex

        public boolean isComplex()
        True if domain is an instance of Complex
        See Also:
        asComplex()

      • isNumber

        public boolean isNumber()
        True if all values of domain are scalar numbers.
        Since:
        0.05

      • isNumeric

        public boolean isNumeric()
        True if all values of domain are (not necessarily scalar) numbers.
        Since:
        0.05

      • isScalar

        public boolean isScalar()
        True if all elements of domain are scalar values.

        This is false for RealJointDomain and JointDiscreteDomain.

        Since:
        0.05

      • inDomain

        public abstract boolean inDomain(@Nullable
               java.lang.Object value)
        Returns:
        true if value is a valid member of the domain. Implementors should not throw a cast exception.

      • containsValueWithRepresentation

        public boolean containsValueWithRepresentation(java.lang.Object representation)
        Returns:
        true if representation corresponds to a valid member of the domain for domains that can represent values using an alternate representation, such as the index of a Discrete domain with enumerated elements.

        The default implementation simply invokes inDomain(Object).

      • domainError

        public DimpleException domainError(@Nullable
                          java.lang.Object value)
        Returns:
        an exception stating that value is not a member of this domain.

      • isIntCompatibleClass

        public static boolean isIntCompatibleClass(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        True if type is one of: Integer, Short, Byte.

      • isIntCompatibleValue

        public static boolean isIntCompatibleValue(java.lang.Object value)

      • isIntCompatibleValue

        public static boolean isIntCompatibleValue(java.lang.Number value)

      • isIntCompatibleValue

        public static boolean isIntCompatibleValue(double value)

      • isIntCompatibleValue

        public static boolean isIntCompatibleValue(long value)
